TopicTitle: Discussion - Official BDAc Development Group AI Challenges

Articles.Content:
Hi all

We at the BDAc Development Group have decided to begin issuing Official BDAc Team challenges

As 1.2 is in pre-release and our coding group are busy squashing bugs, we will not be issuing challenges for 1.2 just yet ... However, in the interim we will be posting an AI challenge for 1.1.3 in the coming days to tide us all over until the pre-release is finished and we have squashed the bugs that have been found with BDAc  in KSP v1.2

We also would like to inform you that we are assembling a challenge team to assist with hosting AI battles as well as testing bugs and experimental builds of BDAc ... Feel free to PM myself if you wish to be involved 

Anyways, the point of this thread is to let all our fellow Kerbo-nots on this forum know that the BDAc team have been planning out some challenges for you guys/gals and to also have a discussion concerning what sort of challenges you would like to see

Thoughts or ideas? ... Suggestions?

The floor is now open

Edited September 23, 2016 by DoctorDavinci
And here is your first challenge from bdac team

Here's some I made earlier. The JSF challenge was the one I most wanted to see.

Later in the same thread, the discovery of how radar worked opened up more ideas:

Moving thread about challenges to Challenges forum.
please show more challenges for BDAC

On 2016-09-22 at 11:57 PM, Snark said:

Moving thread about challenges to Challenges forum.

The purpose of this thread was to provide a discussion concerning future challenges and what the community would like to see ... Point being this was supposed to be a discussion and not a challenge so I beg to differ on your choice to move this thread to the challenges section of the forum

I recognize that the discussion is about challenges, however it is a discussion and not a challenge hence why I have issue with your decision to move the thread to the challenges section of the forum

I defer to your judgement, however I feel that a mistake has been made in your categorizing this thread into the challenges section

Awaiting your response ...

DD

1 hour ago, Nerfclasher said:

please show more challenges for BDAC

They are coming ....

..... Please stand by

If you are discussing challenges, whether issuing them or contemplating them, the Challenges section of the forum is the spot for it, since that's where people interested in this sort of thing will go to look for such discussions.
